verses.verse: <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to them that <S%H2710>decree<s%> <S%H205>unrighteous<s%> <S%H2711>decrees,<s%> and that <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5999>grievousness<s%> which they have <S%H3789>prescribed;<s%>

To <S%H5186>turn<s%> <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H1800>needy<s%> from <S%H1779>judgment,<s%> and to <S%H1497>take<s%> <S%H1497>away<s%> the <S%H4941>right<s%> from the <S%H6041>poor<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> that <S%H490>widows<s%> may be their <S%H7998>prey,<s%> and that they may <S%H962>rob<s%> the <S%H3490>fatherless!<s%>

And <S%H4100>what<s%> will you <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6486>visitation,<s%> and in the <S%H7722>desolation<s%> which shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H4801>far?<s%> to <S%H4310>whom<s%> will you <S%H5127>flee<s%> for <S%H5833>help?<s%> and <S%H575>where<s%> will you <S%H5800>leave<s%> your <S%H3519>glory?<s%>

<S%H1115>Without<s%> me they shall <S%H3766>bow<s%> <S%H3766>down<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H616>prisoners,<s%> and they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H2026>slain.<s%> For <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> his <S%H639>anger<s%> is not <S%H7725>turned<s%> away, but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out <S%H5750>still.<s%>
O <S%H804>Assyrian,<s%> the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and the <S%H4294>staff<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand<s%> is my <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>

I will <S%H7971>send<s%> him against an <S%H2611>hypocritical<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of my <S%H5678>wrath<s%> will I give him a <S%H6680>charge,<s%> to <S%H7997>take<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil,<s%> and to <S%H962>take<s%> the <S%H957>prey,<s%> and to <S%H7760>tread<s%> <S%H4823><s%> them down like the <S%H2563>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%>

However, he <S%H1819>means<s%> not <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> does his <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H2803>think<s%> <S%H3651>so;<s%> but it is in his <S%H3824>heart<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> and <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H1471>nations<s%> not a <S%H4592>few.<s%>
For he <S%H559>said,<s%> Are not my <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H3162>altogether<s%> <S%H4428>kings?<s%>
Is not <S%H3641>Calno<s%> as <S%H3751>Carchemish?<s%> is not <S%H2574>Hamath<s%> as <S%H774>Arpad?<s%> is not <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> as <S%H1834>Damascus?<s%>

As my <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H457>idols,<s%> and whose <S%H6456>graven<s%> images did excel them of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and of <S%H8111>Samaria;<s%>
Shall I not, as I have <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H457>idols,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and her <S%H6091>idols?<s%>

Why it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> has <S%H1214>performed<s%> his <S%H854>whole<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> on <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> and on <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H1433>stout<s%> <S%H3824>heart<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> and the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of his <S%H7312>high<s%> <S%H5869>looks.<s%>

For he <S%H559>said,<s%> By the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of my <S%H3027>hand<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> it, and by my <S%H2451>wisdom;<s%> for I am <S%H995>prudent:<s%> and I have <S%H5493>removed<s%> the <S%H1367>bounds<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and have <S%H8154>robbed<s%> their <S%H6259>treasures,<s%> and I have <S%H3381>put<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> like a <S%H3524>valiant<s%> man:

And my <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H4672>found<s%> as a <S%H7064>nest<s%> the <S%H2428>riches<s%> of the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and as one <S%H622>gathers<s%> <S%H1000>eggs<s%> that are <S%H5800>left,<s%> have I <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> and there was <S%H3808>none<s%> that <S%H5074>moved<s%> the <S%H3671>wing,<s%> or <S%H6475>opened<s%> the <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> or <S%H6850>peeped.<s%>

Shall the <S%H1631>ax<s%> <S%H6286>boast<s%> itself <S%H5921>against<s%> him that <S%H2672>hews<s%> therewith? or shall the <S%H4883>saw<s%> <S%H1431>magnify<s%> itself <S%H5921>against<s%> him that <S%H5130>shakes<s%> it? as if the <S%H7626>rod<s%> should <S%H5130>shake<s%> itself against them that <S%H7311>lift<s%> it up, or as if the <S%H4294>staff<s%> should <S%H7311>lift<s%> up itself, as if it were <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> shall the <S%H113>Lord,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H7971>send<s%> among his <S%H4924>fat<s%> ones <S%H7332>leanness;<s%> and <S%H8478>under<s%> his <S%H3519>glory<s%> he shall <S%H3344>kindle<s%> a <S%H3350>burning<s%> like the <S%H3350>burning<s%> of a <S%H784>fire.<s%>

And the <S%H216>light<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be for a <S%H784>fire,<s%> and his <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One for a <S%H3852>flame:<s%> and it shall <S%H1197>burn<s%> and <S%H398>devour<s%> his <S%H7898>thorns<s%> and his <S%H8068>briers<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%>

And shall <S%H3615>consume<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of his <S%H3293>forest,<s%> and of his <S%H3759>fruitful<s%> field, both <S%H5315>soul<s%> and <S%H1320>body:<s%> and they shall be as when a <S%H5264>standard-bearer<s%> <S%H4549>faints.<s%>
And the <S%H7605>rest<s%> of the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of his <S%H3293>forest<s%> shall be <S%H4557>few,<s%> that a <S%H5288>child<s%> may <S%H3789>write<s%> them.

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and such as are <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H4937>stay<s%> on him that <S%H5221>smote<s%> them; but shall <S%H8172>stay<s%> on the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in <S%H571>truth.<s%>
The <S%H7605>remnant<s%> shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> even the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> to the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H410>God.<s%>

For <S%H518>though<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> yet a <S%H7605>remnant<s%> of them shall <S%H7725>return:<s%> the <S%H3631>consumption<s%> <S%H2782>decreed<s%> shall <S%H7857>overflow<s%> with <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

For the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall <S%H6213>make<s%> a <S%H3617>consumption,<s%> even <S%H2782>determined,<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> O my <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of the <S%H804>Assyrian:<s%> he shall <S%H5221>smite<s%> you with a <S%H7626>rod,<s%> and shall <S%H5375>lift<s%> up his <S%H4294>staff<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>
For <S%H5750>yet<s%> a <S%H4213>very<s%> <S%H4592>little<s%> while, and the <S%H2195>indignation<s%> shall <S%H3615>cease,<s%> and my <S%H639>anger<s%> in their <S%H8399>destruction.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> shall <S%H5782>stir<s%> up a <S%H7752>whip<s%> for him according to the <S%H4347>slaughter<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> at the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of <S%H6157>Oreb:<s%> and as his <S%H4294>rod<s%> was on the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> so shall he <S%H5375>lift<s%> it up after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that his <S%H5448>burden<s%> shall be <S%H5493>taken<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> your <S%H7926>shoulder,<s%> and his <S%H5923>yoke<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> your <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> shall be <S%H2254>destroyed<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H8081>anointing.<s%>
He is <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H5857>Aiath,<s%> he is <S%H5674>passed<s%> to <S%H4051>Migron;<s%> at <S%H4363>Michmash<s%> he has <S%H6485>laid<s%> up his <S%H3627>carriages:<s%>

They are <S%H5674>gone<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H4569>passage:<s%> they have <S%H3885>taken<s%> up their <S%H4411>lodging<s%> at <S%H1387>Geba;<s%> <S%H7414>Ramah<s%> is <S%H2729>afraid;<s%> <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> is <S%H5127>fled.<s%>
<S%H6670>Lift<s%> up your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1554>Gallim:<s%> cause it to be <S%H7181>heard<s%> to <S%H3919>Laish,<s%> O <S%H6041>poor<s%> <S%H6068>Anathoth.<s%>
<S%H4088>Madmenah<s%> is <S%H5074>removed;<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1374>Gebim<s%> <S%H5756>gather<s%> themselves to flee.

As <S%H5750>yet<s%> shall he <S%H5975>remain<s%> at <S%H5011>Nob<s%> that <S%H3117>day:<s%> he shall <S%H5130>shake<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H1004>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H113>Lord,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> shall <S%H5586>lop<s%> the <S%H6288>bough<s%> with <S%H4637>terror:<s%> and the <S%H7312>high<s%> ones of <S%H6967>stature<s%> shall be <S%H1438>hewn<s%> <S%H1438>down,<s%> and the <S%H1364>haughty<s%> shall be <S%H8213>humbled.<s%>
And he shall <S%H5362>cut<s%> down the <S%H5442>thickets<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%> with <S%H1270>iron,<s%> and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by a <S%H117>mighty<s%> one.
